name: Espresso Americano
description: A smooth and bold black coffee made by adding hot water to a shot of espresso, delivering a lighter strength without compromising on flavor.

name: Espresso Doppio
description: A strong and concentrated double shot of espresso, offering twice the intensity for true coffee enthusiasts.

name: Espresso Long Black
description: A bold coffee prepared by pouring hot water over a double shot of espresso, preserving the crema while balancing strength and smoothness.

name: Espresso Ristretto
description: An intense and rich short shot of espresso brewed with less water, delivering maximum flavor and aroma in every sip.

name: Caffè Latte
description: A comforting blend of espresso and steamed milk, topped with a thin layer of microfoam for a smooth, velvety finish.

name: Caramel Latte
description: A creamy latte infused with rich caramel syrup, balancing sweetness and espresso for a perfect indulgence.

name: Cinnamon Latte
description: A spiced latte flavored with a dash of aromatic cinnamon, creating a cozy and flavorful coffee experience.

name: Latte Macchiato
description: A layered coffee drink where steamed milk is topped with a shot of espresso, creating a visually appealing and creamy delight.

name: Mocha Caramel
description: A decadent fusion of espresso, chocolate, and caramel syrup, topped with steamed milk and foam for a sweet, rich indulgence.

name: Mocha Cocoa
description: A chocolate-forward coffee made with espresso, cocoa, and steamed milk, creating a velvety, dessert-like experience.

name: Mocha Double Chocolate
description: An indulgent mocha made with extra chocolate syrup and espresso, perfect for chocolate lovers seeking a rich coffee treat.

name: Mocha Hazelnut
description: Espresso with steamed milk, chocolate, and nutty hazelnut flavor.

name: Mocha Walnut
description: Espresso with chocolate and walnut essence, creating a nutty mocha twist.

name: Dry Cappuccino
description: Espresso with minimal milk, topped with extra foam for a strong yet airy drink.

name: Wet Cappuccino
description: Espresso blended with more steamed milk and light foam for a creamier texture.

name: Freddo Cappuccino
description: A Greek-style iced cappuccino with frothed milk over chilled espresso.

name: Iced Latte
description: A refreshing chilled version of the classic latte, made with espresso, cold milk, and ice for a smooth and cool drink.

name: Iced Caramel Latte
description: A chilled caramel latte served over ice, combining espresso, milk, and caramel syrup for a sweet, refreshing treat.

name: Iced Café Mocha
description: Chilled espresso with milk and chocolate syrup, topped with whipped cream.

name: Iced Oatmeal Espresso
description: Smooth espresso poured over oat milk and ice for a dairy-free delight.
